EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Recording: Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
October 21, 2011 Webinar Recording: Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview
Please check out the following information about the Sweet Billing Version 5.8 release, coming soon:
Webinar Recording Link: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/jmzmzpz
Version 5.8 Release Document: http://www.tritechems.com/documents/EMS_Billing_5-8Features_102011.pdf
Check out other educational webinars here: http://www.tritechems.com/TriTech-University/Webinars.asp
Listen to EMS1.com Speak with Charlie Barry, TriTech Product Manager, About the Future of Online EMS Software: (copy and paste into a browser window) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-CdXqYEvP00
The TriTech Software Systems Team www.tritech.com Phone: 800-537-3927 Sales@TriTech.com
